codes.code: from engine.engine_template import EngineTemplatepkglineflagfrom wifuxlogger import WifuxLogger as LOGpkglineflagpkglineflagdef run(cmds):pkglineflag    text = ""pkglineflag    while True:pkglineflag        msg = input()pkglineflag        if msg == ":w!":pkglineflag            f = open(cmds[1],"w+")pkglineflag            f.write(text)pkglineflag            f.close()pkglineflag        elif msg == ":wq!":pkglineflag            f = open(cmds[1],"w+")pkglineflag            f.write(text)pkglineflag            f.close()pkglineflag            breakpkglineflag        elif msg == ":q!":pkglineflag            breakpkglineflag        elif msg == ":clear!":pkglineflag            text = ""pkglineflag        else:pkglineflag            text += msgpkglineflag            text += "\n"
